main event: An unusual sighting of a silver object resembling a star was reported in LaGrange, Georgia on December 24, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed at a height of 20 miles,The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes,The object moved westward,The report stated the object exhibited unusual flight patterns,There was insufficient data to determine the nature of the object.
sighted object: a silver object resembling a star
witness description: individuals who considered the flight patterns unusual
